Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as a threat to free speech and democratic principles.
The ACMA, an unelected body, would have too much power to determine truth, which could lead to manipulation and totalitarianism.
Historical examples are cited where misinformation was used by regimes to suppress truth.
The government has previously been misinformed, as seen during the pandemic, leading to negative consequences.
Notable Quotes: The Truth has always been a threat to those who want to control thinking, speech and the populace.
